description: Aria Integrative Medicine is the leading center for integrative medicine focusing on autoimmune diseases and chronic inflammatory conditions
cleaned_text: Autoimmune Diseases Autoimmune diseases are conditions where our immune system attacks our own body. Autoimmunity affects 1 in 7 Americans. From the thyroid to the joints, autoimmune diseases can be in any part of the body. Our specialists can help you understand your autoimmune condition or help you determine if autoimmunity is affecting you.
